title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
author: Atharva Kamble
speech: You need follow your mind and not to be in under control of any other person. You should independent to do anything, anyone should not pressure you to do any work.
thought: Be the master of a mind rather than mastered by mind...

title: The Midas Touch
author: Lalit Kamble
speech: Don't be scared by any difficult situation, there is a risk but we need to take that risk and go forward. If you overcome that situation so you can live happily. If you loose then you can guide to others.
thought: Take risks in your life, if you win you can lead, if you loose you can guide...
